abstract: Kenneth Feld of Feld Entertainment wants to know whether potential hires can think unconventionally — and translate their knowledge into profits for the company.
snippet: Kenneth Feld of Feld Entertainment wants to know whether potential hires can think unconventionally — and translate their knowledge into profits for the company.
lead_paragraph: This interview with Kenneth Feld, chairman and C.E.O. of Feld Entertainment, was conducted and condensed by Adam Bryant. Feld Entertainment’s operations include Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey circus and Disney on Ice.

headline.main: Yes, You’re Smart, but Can You Make Money?
headline.print_headline: Yes, You’re Smart, but Can You Make Money?

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Ringling Bros and Barnum & Bailey Circus
